name: Send people a reply when they send you a text message to enter your SMS contest. Add the incoming SMS messages to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as new rows.
description: Every time someone sends you a text message to enter your SMS text message contest, Make will automatically text a response that tells him/her if the answer is correct or not. All text messages that were sent to the SMS contest will be automatically added to a Google Spreadsheet as new rows. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://goo.gl/AQplUK).
